word: WHAT IT MEANS TO PRAY IN JESUS\92 NAME.\97To pray in Christ\92s name means much. It means that we are to accept His character, manifest His spirit, and work His works. The Saviour\92s promise is given on condition. \93If ye love Me,\94 He says, \93keep My commandments.\94 He saves men, not in sin, but from sin; and those who love Him will show their love by obedience.\97(The Desire of Ages, 668.)
